Class PatientMenu

java.lang.Object
menus.PatientMenu
public class PatientMenu extends Object
The PatientMenu class provides an interface for a patient to manage various tasks such as viewing medical records, updating personal information, scheduling and rescheduling appointments, and viewing appointment outcomes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PatientMenu(Patient patient, MedicalRecordManager medicalRecordManager, AppointmentManager appointmentManager, AppointmentOutcomeManager appointmentOutcomeManager, UserDB userDB)
    Constructs a PatientMenu with the specified patient, medical record manager, appointment manager, and appointment outcome manager.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    displayMenu()
    Displays the patient menu and handles user input for different actions.

      public PatientMenu(Patient patient, MedicalRecordManager medicalRecordManager, AppointmentManager appointmentManager, AppointmentOutcomeManager appointmentOutcomeManager, UserDB userDB)
      Constructs a PatientMenu with the specified patient, medical record manager, appointment manager, and appointment outcome manager.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient using the menu
      medicalRecordManager - the manager handling medical records
      appointmentManager - the manager handling appointments
      appointmentOutcomeManager - the manager handling appointment outcomes
